name: Deadly Attachment
summary: It's been 4 years since Samantha last saw her stepbrother Daniel. Suddenly he comes back home for her eighteenth birthday with his new girlfriend Jess. Sam can't be any happier - she always adored Dan and missed him terribly. But their reunion is ruined with the news of Jess' death. Police considers it to be a robbery, but Sam sensing something fishy, decides to start her own investigation.
